function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Accelerated review process due to COVID-19 outbreak","Impact":"Potential decrease in quality and accuracy of published research results","Mitigation":"Implement thorough peer review and quality control processes","Technologies":"Peer review software, plagiarism detection software","People":"Scientists, researchers","Owner":"Journal publishers, scientific communities"},{"Description":"Increased publication lag during COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Delayed availability of critical information for supply chain professionals and public authorities","Mitigation":"Streamline editorial processes, increase efficiency in publishing workflow","Technologies":"Editorial management software, publishing automation tools","People":"Scientists, public authorities, supply chain professionals","Owner":"Journal publishers, editorial teams"},{"Description":"Use of VOSviewer software to analyze co-occurrence of keywords","Impact":"Potential misinterpretation of data based on keyword associations","Mitigation":"Ensure thorough validation and interpretation of keyword co-occurrence results","Technologies":"Data validation software, statistical analysis tools","People":"Researchers, data analysts","Owner":"Research institutions, scientific communities"}]}
